label: 国家珍宝帳
対訳語: Record of the Nation's Rare Treasures.
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 57th  . Nara National Museum . 2005
見出し読み: こっかちんぽうちょう
説明文: A list of fovorite imperial objects that were donated to the Great Buddha of Tōdaiji by Empress Kōmyō on the twenty-first day of the sixth month of 756, forty-nine days after the death of her husband Emperor Shōmu. The extant treasures from this list are stored in the Shōsō-in's North Section. See also Tōdaiji kenmotsu chō. [東大寺、光明皇后、聖武天皇、正倉院、北倉、東大寺献物帳]
